{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is about risk factors for avascular necrosis of bone in patients with systemic lupus erythematosus. Bronchiectasis, cystic fibrosis, chronic bronchitis, choriocarcinoma, septic arthritis, and systemic lupus erythematosus are mentioned.
